summary: Implements a Home Assistant switch platform that controls network devices using Wake‑On‑LAN. It defines a switch entity that can send a magic packet to a configured MAC address, optionally verify reachability via ping, and execute a user‑defined script to turn the device off, keeping the entity state synchronized with the device’s power status.
business_intent: Enable users to automate power‑on and power‑off of computers or other networked equipment through Home Assistant by exposing Wake‑On‑LAN functionality as a standard switch entity.
